jokes.joke: Why did the chicken join a band?
How many tickles does it take to make an octopus laugh?
Why did the scarecrow win an award?
jokes.description: Because he was outstanding in his field!

jokes.joke: What do you get when you cross a snowman and a vampire?
Why don’t skeletons fight each other?
What do you call fake spaghetti?
Why did the math book look sad?
jokes.description: Because it had too many problems.

jokes.joke: Why don’t some couples go to the gym?
jokes.description: Because some relationships don’t work out.
